Package ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    An Account represents a user's local account (account name and protocol).
    AuthInfo  
    AuthState
    Class to encapsulate state transitions for authenticated key exchange
    Base64Coder
    A Base64 Encoder/Decoder.
    Buddy
    A Buddy represents a remote user (local Account and remote username).
    ConnContext
    The class which stores the state for a conversation context and processes messages
    CTR  
    Data  
    InBuf
    Manage input from byte arrays.
    MAC  
    MsgState
    Class to encapsulate control of outgoing messages
    OutBuf
    Manage output into byte arrays.
    PrivKey
    A PrivKey stores the private and public long-term authentication keys for an individual account.
    Proto  
    SM  
    StateMachine
    Generic State Machine class
    TLV
    A TLV stores a (type, length, value) tuple.
    UserState
    A UserState encapsulates the list of known fingerprints and the list of known private keys.
    Util  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OTRException
    Encapsulates OTR Exception message
